name: places/ChIJ-YdL1LJZwokRZJZJvCN4exo
formattedAddress: 1224 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1224 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

authorAttribution.displayName: Luiz Miguel Rottili Gomes de Oliveira

originalText.text: First, when I arrived it was a employee who had no idea what he was doing there. He didn't mention that more than 20pound of clothes were extra expensive. On the front door it was telling free pick-up and free delivery, when I asked him what time he could deliver, he said it would cost $5.00. Finally, I gave my credit card to pay it, and the lady said that it was interest to use credit card, what it was not mention before. Terrible service, terrible professionals, and terrible cleaner. They are also liar, because in front of the store, there is a message saying that the cost per pound was 0.99c, but I paid almost $1.6/pound. That's ridiculous.

text.text: First, when I arrived it was a employee who had no idea what he was doing there. He didn't mention that more than 20pound of clothes were extra expensive. On the front door it was telling free pick-up and free delivery, when I asked him what time he could deliver, he said it would cost $5.00. Finally, I gave my credit card to pay it, and the lady said that it was interest to use credit card, what it was not mention before. Terrible service, terrible professionals, and terrible cleaner. They are also liar, because in front of the store, there is a message saying that the cost per pound was 0.99c, but I paid almost $1.6/pound. That's ridiculous.

originalText.text: wish I had read the reviews first---poor quality zipper replacement--didn't complain about this because I didn't confirm quality (thought it would be comparable to one they took out) but-left dress to be hemmed and nothing was done!  when I took it back the lady started yelling at me!  worst service, unprofessional and overall bad experience--I would AVOID at all costs!!!!  Man in back was also yelling at me (with no mask) because I asked for a new $5 bill -since he gave me a ripped one-and he refused!  Really surprised they can stay in business!

originalText.text: DO NOT USE! False advertising and horrible service. Does not offer free pickup and delivery and does not honor the 20% off new customer advertisement

text.text: DO NOT USE! False advertising and horrible service. Does not offer free pickup and delivery and does not honor the 20% off new customer advertisement

originalText.text: Awful dry cleaners and wash and fold. Get angry when you take any issue with a service they provided (i.e. mysterious stains, wrinkled shirts, etc.). Become annoyed when you get there as soon as they open.

text.text: Awful dry cleaners and wash and fold. Get angry when you take any issue with a service they provided (i.e. mysterious stains, wrinkled shirts, etc.). Become annoyed when you get there as soon as they open.

originalText.text: We moved to the neighborhood three months ago and they have been really efficient and professional at cleaning our clothes.  We have no complaints and really appreciate the service they provide.
